# Auto-generated for Document admin responsibilities and contacts
def document_admin_responsibilities_and_contacts(contacts_file="docs/admin_contacts.csv", output_md="docs/ADMIN_CONTACTS.md"):
    """Generate a markdown summary of admin responsibilities and contacts."""
    import csv, os
    lines = ["# Admin Responsibilities and Contacts", ""]
    if os.path.exists(contacts_file):
        with open(contacts_file, newline="") as csvfile:
            reader = csv.DictReader(csvfile)
            for row in reader:
                lines.append(f"- **{row['app']}**: {row['contact']}")
    else:
        lines.append("_No contacts available._")
    os.makedirs(os.path.dirname(output_md), exist_ok=True)
    with open(output_md, "w") as md:
        md.write("\n".join(lines))
    return output_md
